config.nbtvoid.title: Configure NBT Void
config.nbtvoid.isenableddescription: When disabled, will not save any items
config.nbtvoid.maxdisplayitemrowsdescrip: Maximum amount of rows (9 items) void tab will display. Does not affect search
config.nbtvoid.maxstoreditemrowsdescript: Maximum amount of rows (9 items) void will store. Older items will be removed after reaching this limit
config.nbtvoid.defaultsearchquerydescrip: Default search query in the void tab
config.nbtvoid.namecheckdescription: Search type for occurrence of name queries
config.nbtvoid.nbtcheckdescription: Search type for occurrence of NBT queries
config.nbtvoid.dochecktooltipdescription: Search for name queries in tooltip (including lore, enchantments and so on). May greatly reduce performance
config.nbtvoid.ignorenbtdescription: NBT paths that will be ignored when checking does item have NBT
config.nbtvoid.removenbtdescription: NBT paths that will be removed when adding item to the void
config.nbtvoid.dosavedescription: Automatically save and load NBT void between sessions
config.nbtvoid.updatedescription: Update the void to match current exceptions. Don't forget to save changes in "Ignore" and "Remove" NBTs in order for it to work
config.nbtvoid.loadvoiddescription: Load void from the save file
config.nbtvoid.savevoiddescription: Save void to the save file
